Player History
Drafted in 27th round, 426th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
Traded from Brooklyn to Houston on 6/30/2015 (Going to BRO: 1B Efren Garlow. Going to HOU: C Eldon Gowin)...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/4/2015, off Danilo Mota (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/8/2015, off William Halsey (BRO)...
Drove in 7 runs against New York on 7/8/2017...
Won World Series with Houston in 2017...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/14/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $850,000 per year...
